original_title: #ЯПсих: Депрессия, булимия, пограничное расстройство, посттравматический синдром
overview: Four people, four mental diagnoses, one city, one therapist. A reality TV series about the people of Berlin, they live like everyone else-go to work, go to clubs, raise children. But everyone has a "second life" - a mental diagnosis that you have to deal with every day. Every day they keep video diaries and openly, on camera, tell how they are trying to defeat the disease.
title: #IAmCrazy: Depression, Bulimia, Borderline Disorder, PTSD
